issue.title: [R] Support for Tensor class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11636](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11636). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice to have support for the [Tensor class](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/api/tensor.html#dense-tensors) in the R package. 

I'm interested in using it for a reliable way to transfer torch tensors between R sessions.

I can submit a PR in a few days for discussion.

Thanks very much!

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11636?focusedCommentId=17285368) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Thanks! Happy to help if you have any questions, feel free to ping me.
